short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom page width for Google Forms web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Forms Tweaks allows to customize the page width of a Google Forms document, making heavy-loaded selection grids easier to use without horizontal scrolling. The user can select relative page width (in percents) - and Google Forms quizz or questionnaire will fill the screen accordingly.
